description.name: Rain suit PVC/POLYESTER size M
description.long_desc:
The Jacket and Trouser Set. Both include sewn and taped waterproof seams. (Sold as set, pouch included).



  • Front hand pockets

  • Foldaway storm hood with draw-cord

  • Sewn and taped waterproofed seams

  • Packs away into a compact pouch

  • Elasticated cuffs

  • Full front zip fastening with stud closing front storm flap

  • Material: Polyester coated with PVC

description.name: Welding Machine 200A MIG/TIG/MMA 230V
description.long_desc:
Microprocessor controlled 200A MIG/TIG/MMA 230V Multi-Function Welder.


Technical Data































Wire Dia. Size 0,6 - 1,0 mm
MMA Electrode Size 2,0 - 3,2 mm
Wire Feed Speed 0,6 - 1,0 mm
No-load Voltage 56V
I1max 30.3 A
I1eff 22.2 A
Power Factor 0.93

MIG

















MIG Duty Cycle 100% 60%
Current 160 A 220 A
Voltage 22 V 25 V

TIG

















TIG Duty Cycle 100% 60%
Current 160 A 220 A
Voltage 16.4 V 18.8 V

MMA

















MMA Duty Cycle 100% 60%
Current 160 A 220 A
Voltage 26.4 V 28.8 V

category.name: Circulation Pumps for Central Heating and Hot Water
category.path: Tools for Plumbers\Circulation Pumps for Central Heating and Hot Water

category_idosell.path: Tools for Plumbers\Circulation Pumps for Central Heating and Hot Water

description.name: Pump CO Electronic Energy-saving 25-40 / 180
description.long_desc:
Electronic Energy-Saving Circulation Pump 25-40/180 for central heating installations. Suitable for domestic hot water and central heating. The energy-saving GEKO pump allows you to automatically control the pressure difference by regulating the speed and adapting it to the current demand. Only 5 watts minimum power consumption.


Technical Data

















































Input Voltage230V, ~50-60Hz
Power Consumption (AUTO mode)from 5 to 22W
Rate of Flowup to 40 L/min (2,4 m3/h)
Installation Length180 mm
Threaded ConnectionG1 1/2
Pressure Head4 m
Media Temperaturemin. +2°C, max. +95°C
Max Pressure1,0 MPa
Protection ClassIP44
Insulation ClassF
CertificatesCE

Package Content


  • Circulation pump

  • Union fitting set cast iron 6/4 in x 1 in (2 pcs)

  • Electric supply cable 1.1m length
description.short_desc:
Electronic Energy-Saving Circulation Pump 25-40/180 for central heating installations. Suitable for domestic hot water and central heating. The energy-saving GEKO pump allows you to automatically control the pressure difference by regulating the speed and adapting it to the current demand. Only 5 watts minimum power consumption.

Power Consumption (AUTO mode)from 5 to 22W
Rate of Flowup to 40 L/min (2,4 m3/h)
Installation Length180 mm

Max Pressure1,0 MPa
Protection ClassIP44
Insulation ClassF
CertificatesCE

  • Union fitting set cast iron 6/4 in x 1 in (2 pcs)

  • Electric supply cable 1.1m length

description.name: Circulation pump for hot utility water CP15-15
description.long_desc:
Circulation Pump CP15-15 GEKO for hot utility water. This circulation pump is used to force the circulation of hot tap water in single and multi-family houses.


Technical Data































Max Pressure 10 bar
Insulation Class F
Input Voltage 230V, 50-60Hz
Power Consumption 28 W
Installation Length 85 mm
Threaded Connection G1/2
Media Temperature min. +2°C, max. +95°C
description.short_desc:

Installation Length 85 mm
Threaded Connection G1/2
Media Temperature min. +2°C, max. +95°C

description.name: Łącznik podstawy przecinarki do metalu G81024 (1)
12V Cordless Tire Compressor 150PSI
description.long_desc:
Cordless Tire Compressor can easily pump up your car tyres, bicycle tyres, footballs, air beds and more.


Product Features



  • Pressure up to 150 PSI

  • Fitted with a digital display and LED light so you can always get the pressure right

  • The automatic shut off will stop inflation once the desired pressure level has been achieved

  • The On/Off switch can be locked in the On position

  • With three different nozzles the inflator can inflate virtually anything


Technical Data



  • Voltage: 12V

  • Battery: Li-Ion 1500 mAh

  • Units: PSI, Bar, kPa, kg/cm²


Check out the tool test on Youtube:

category.name: Painting Guns and Units
category.path: Construction and Renovation\Painting Guns and Units

category_idosell.path: Construction and Renovation\Painting Guns and Units

description.name: Electric Airless Paint Sprayer
description.long_desc:
Electric Airless Sprayer GEKO DP-X6. Ideal for spraying low and medium viscosity paint material like latex and acrylic coatings. Compact, portable design - making it perfect for light-duty projects such as decks, fences, and other painting projects. The high pressure pump delivers a finely atomized spray for a flawless professional finish.


Coating types: water-based paints; oil-based paints; latex; enamels; lacquers; varnishes; primers; stains.


Product Features



  • Compact, lightweight and easy to carry

  • Adjustable pressure - from low pressure cleaning, medium pressure rolling and high pressure airless painting

  • X-450 forged aluminium gun for exceptional durability

  • Flexible suction tube spray directly paint containers

  • Piston rod automatic lubrication


Technical Data



  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50Hz

  • Motor Power: 650W

  • Max. Flow Rate: 1400 ml/min

  • Efficiency: 6-8 m²/min

  • Max. Pressure: 200 bar / 2900 PSI / 20 MPa

  • Pressure Controlling: mechanical


Package Contents:



  • Electric Airless Sprayer DP-X6

  • X-450 spray gun with airless tip 0,48mm

  • Tip 517X

  • 30cm nozzle extension wand

  • 1/4'' x 7.5m high pressure hose

  • Operation manual

description.name: Tool trolley with side panels JS-17A
description.long_desc:
Professional workshop trolley that allows you to maintain order in the workplace. The trolley has three spacious shelves and an ergonomic handle for easy transport. In addition, it has 4 castors including 2 swivel castors (one with a brake).


Product Features



  • Three Shelves

  • Shelves clearance: 242 mm

  • 2 fixed castors and 2 swivel castors (one with brake)

  • Plastic coated castors to prevent scratching of the ground

  • Side perforated panels to hang tools and accessories

  • Ergonomic handle


Dimensions

































Width Depth Height
Dimensions 700 mm 348 mm 665 mm
Dimensions with handle and castors 775 mm 348 mm 760 mm
Shelves Inner Dimensions 695 mm 345 mm 55 mm
Castors Size 75 mm 25 mm -

category.name: Torque Wrenches
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Torque Wrenches

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Torque Wrenches

description.name: Digital Torque Adapter 1/2 Inch Drive with 3/8 1/4 Socket
description.long_desc:
Digital Torque Adapter can be used to recalibrate any type of torque wrench.


Product Features



  • Recalibration device for torque wrenches

  • Units of measure: Kg-CM, Kg-M, In.-lb., Ft.-lb, N-m

  • Range: 40 - 200 Nm

  • Converts any ratchet into a torque measuring tool

  • LED backlight

  • 10 memory settings

  • Contains one DC 3V, CR2032 battery
